dataList.dlg: You need not hide any secrets from me.
Ruminate on your yesterday. It shall prove useful for extricating the present from woes.
An infinite spectrum comprises the ray of light cast by the sun. Likewise, this world hides countless secrets.
Secret words are whispered in the dark. You must always have your ear to the ground.
I would like to study your head when I get the chance one day.
No man is without weakness. It is why no amount of extravagance and intimidation a move poses can threaten me.
A little bit of attention can bring in much information. For instance, you will know that now is not a good time to talk to Heathcliff.
If you ever yearn to know your past, give me a request. ...You'd rather not, I see... Dante, you are such a bizarre and curious specimen.
So far, I have yet to run out of curiosities to find here. The joy of discovery sates my hunger, and so do you.
Hmm... Silence can speak much in a way.
It was as I expected.
It's time to enrich my knowledge.
What am I to study this time?
How about you examine that one?
I have finished studying you.
That one has become vulnerable.
Oh...
They've fallen into silence.
Not the most flattering situation.
It is as predicted.
This was unexpected...
I've successfully analyzed the enemy's behavior.
That was an effective exploitation of their weaknesses.
We ought to explore other means...
